overview.en: GBA (Global Blockchain Alliance) aims to help 100 million people know about blockchain and become the 'New Oriental ' of blockchain education. The QLM facilitate the realization of the goal of letting 100 million people know about blockchain, to feedback the value generated by blockchain training education to the community, to make the QLM become the blood of the community, and to help the community constantly grow.
overview.zh: 全链盟（全球区块链爱好者联盟）立志让一亿人了解区块链，成为区块链教育的“新东方”。全链盟通证的主要作用是助力实现让一亿人了解区块链的目标，把区块链培训教育产生的价值反哺给社区，让通证成为社区的血液，帮助社区不断壮大和成长。
